title.narrative: Implementing the PNG LNG Joint Understanding

description.narrative: Funding under this initiative establishes a Joint Understanding between Papua New Guinea and Australia setting out mutual understandings and further cooperation of the PNG LNG Project. Under the Joint Understanding, Australia committed to provide a package of assistance to assist the Papua New Guinea Government, including advice and assistance to establish sovereign wealth funds to manage the revenue increases flowing from the project; technical and other assistance to address urgent capacity constraints and respond to increased demands during the PNG LNG construction phase; and economic modelling to identify the potential impacts of the PNG LNG project. The total value of this initiative is $0.9 million over 2 years, starting 2011-12.
